item.title: Aliens!

item.title: Cookies!
item.description: 3 yrs / 9 months / 17 days old Lisa loves using her hands: drawing, cutting figures out with scissors, baking. She is showing great skill in it too. Sheâ€™ll take a magazine and cut out some very small figures. She is also loves to draw and she seems to be good at it. Check out her drawings of a cat and a clown face. The other day she baked cookies with her mom.
